main.name: Cyril Emmanuel
main.description: A dynamic and visionary Engineer with extensive experience in spearheading the development of innovative software solutions.
main.bio: A dynamic and visionary Lead Software Engineer with extensive experience in spearheading the development of innovative software solutions. Expert in guiding diverse teams towards the achievement of organizational goals, leveraging advanced technical skills in full-stack development, project management, and strategic planning. Committed to employing cutting-edge technologies and methodologies to solve complex challenges and drive business success. As a seasoned Lead Software Engineer with a comprehensive background in both front-end and back-end development, I excel in creating innovative solutions that bridge technology and user needs. My expertise spans across a wide range of programming languages including PHP, React.js, and Next.js, coupled with profound knowledge in database management systems such as MongoDB and MySQL.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me for innovative software solutions!

work.title: Head of Technical
work.description: Responsible for leading a team of full stack, frontend, backend developers and other technical teams in the design, development, and maintenance of scalable applications.

work.title: Ag Head ICT
work.description: This role requires managing people, researching, and implementing IT initiatives. Maintaining the organization's computers and networks This position requires planning and implementing enterprise IT solutions to improve cost-effectiveness, service quality, and business development.

work.title: Chief Transformation Officer
work.description: Plan technical implementation and advise architecture and infrastructure decisions. Co-design scalable technical platforms with new product development.
